sources.name: ADLdataset01
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  ADLdataset01

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared ADLdataset01 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adltest08.dfs.core.windows.net/test01/sales.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = ADLdataset01,
  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"ProductKey", "ProductAlternateKey", "EnglishProductName", "StandardCost", "FinishedGoodsFlag", "Color", "SafetyStockLevel", "ReorderPoint", "ListPrice", "Size", "SizeRange", "Weight", "DaysToManufacture", "ProductLine", "DealerPrice", "Class", "Style", "ModelName", "EnglishProductSubcategoryName", "EnglishProductCategoryName"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Choose columns", {{"ProductKey", Int64.Type}, {"StandardCost", Currency.Type}, {"SafetyStockLevel", Int64.Type}, {"ReorderPoint", Int64.Type}, {"ListPrice", Currency.Type}, {"Weight", type number}, {"DaysToManufacture", Int64.Type}, {"DealerPrice", Currency.Type}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"EnglishProductName", "ProductName"}, {"EnglishProductSubcategoryName", "ProductSubcategoryName"}, {"EnglishProductCategoryName", "ProductCategoryName"}}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"ProductKey", "ProductAlternateKey", "ProductName", "ProductSubcategoryName", "ProductCategoryName", "StandardCost", "FinishedGoodsFlag", "Color", "SafetyStockLevel", "ReorderPoint", "ListPrice", "Size", "SizeRange", "Weight", "DaysToManufacture", "ProductLine", "DealerPrice", "Class", "Style", "ModelName"})
in
  #"Reordered columns";
